title: AMAZING RESIDENCE AT PORTOFINO South of Fifth!!!
posting_body: ['Amazing residence at the iconic Portofino in South of Fifth!.', 'Fully renovated and tastefully designed, featuring 2 bedrooms + den and 2 1/2 bathrooms, new kitchen with top of the line appliances, new bathrooms and nice Murphy bed by the Den to create an extra bedroom for guest! .', 'This beautiful residence offers from every ambience, stunning panoramic views of the City and the Ocean!', 'Offering outdoor space on double side view terrace.', 'Discover double doors opening up to your contemporary and minimalistic lifestyle residence.', 'Fully Furnished.', 'Great service luxury building with new pool (on progress), spa and more!', 'Enjoy your new property!', 'With the best views in Miami Beach and walking distance to the Beach, restaurants, parks, events and all the best that Miami Beach has to offer!!', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
